name: Eyas
description:
Description:

When a baby hawk falls out of his nest.
He huddles, frightened and alone, calling for a mother who never comes.
A jaded female fox discovers the him and finds purpose.

NOTE:

Please download the 1.2 version of Eyas, as it fixes a bug that happens if you hit a certain variable. This issue should be fixed now in the later update!

(Made for Tyranojam 2017)

Genres:

Short, Story-focused, Animals

Features:

  • -Animals, woot!
  • 2 Endings
  • -Colorful Art!
  • -Music by the very talented Gas1312
